All right, that's it.  I REALLY have to ask this.  I only get cable, but it=
 seems that there is a tv show called Shisengumi! on one of my tv channels =
(ch. 35) that is NOT NHK.  So I was sondering if this is the same show (not=
e the name) or another one.  This channel 35 is not purely Japanese, but th=
ere's also Chinese, Korean, and Vietnamese languages and shows at different=
 times (all asian, in short).  If anybody else lives in Southern CA and can=
 tell me if it's the same tv show as the one on NHK, I would greatly apprec=
iate it!  It has english subtitles, BTW ^ ^;;;
